text: 1st time having dinner to celebrate birthday with family. Placed wasnâ€™t crowded during weekdays. Staff was very attentive and friendly. Ordered chili crab, black pepper crab, pork ribs, prawns roll, yam ring, pan-fried beehoon all were great, except yam paste not very suite our taste as it added some sweet corn which we donâ€™t like corn and not the authentic taste of oh nee. Overall dishes were above average, crab very fresh. Hope they can keep up the quality and standard. Lastly thanks for their promotion dine free for birthday baby. Will recommend more birthday babyðŸ˜….

Overall the food was delicious and the seafood was fresh, the crabs were decent and just one would have been enough for 6 people, the rest of the dishes were delightful as well. The pepper crab sauce was fine and spicy, and if the chilli crab sauce could be spicier that be great. There were a lack of waiters that could take orders that evening, so had to exercise some patience.

I recently had the pleasure of being served by Nancy, and she was fantastic! Her friendly attitude and attention to detail really made the dining experience enjoyable. She was attentive without being intrusive, made sure everything was perfect with our meal, and had great recommendations from the menu. Itâ€™s clear she cares about her customers and goes the extra mile to provide excellent service. Highly recommend asking for Nancy if you want a great dining experience!

Celebrated our thanksgiving dinner here. Nancy, our server was very kind and attentive. Made sure our table was clean all the time and took care of us the whole evening.

All the food we ordered were excellent and very delicious. Fresh and if we could eat more, we wouldnâ€™t hesitate. Crab with butter sauce was very very good. Glad we discovered this place. Weâ€™ll be back!
Waitress Nancy is very nice lady. She serves us well and attend to request. Overall food is so so. Food serves hot.
